data.quote: Anything that lights your world leaves it dark once it's gone.
data.author: Ashly Lorenzana

data.quote: Inside all of us is a light, but some beacons are darker than others, and some are so dark they never realize they are a form of light at all.
data.author: Courtney M. Privett

data.quote: One has to abandon altogether the search for security, and reach out to the risk of living with both arms. One has to court doubt and darkness as the cost of knowing.
data.author: Morris L. West

data.quote: Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that.
data.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

data.quote: We can easily forgive a child who is afraid of the dark; the real tragedy of life is when men are afraid of the light.
data.author: Plato

data.quote: There are darknesses in life and there are lights, and you are one of the lights, the light of all lights.
data.author: Bram Stoker

data.quote: Someone I loved once gave me a box full of darkness. It took me years to understand that this too, was a gift.
data.author: Mary Oliver

data.quote: Stars, hide your fires; Let not light see my black and deep desires.
data.author: William Shakespeare

data.quote: Look at how a single candle can both defy and define the darkness.
data.author: Anne Frank

data.quote: I will love the light for it shows me the way, yet I will endure the darkness for it shows me the stars.
data.author: Og Mandino

data.quote: Long is the way and hard, that out of Hell leads up to light.
data.author: John Milton

data.quote: When you spend so long trapped in darkness, you find that the darkness begins to stare back.
data.author: Sarah J. Maas

data.quote: How can I be substantial if I do not cast a shadow? I must have a dark side also If I am to be whole.
data.author: C.G. Jung

data.quote: One need not be a chamber to be haunted.
data.author: Emily Dickinson

data.quote: Do not let your difficulties fill you with anxiety, after all it is only in the darkest nights that stars shine more brightly.
data.author: Ali Ibn Abi Talib AS

data.quote: Ten years of shadows, but no longer. Light up the darkness, Majesty.
data.author: Sarah J. Maas

data.quote: Too much of anything could destroy you, Simon thought. Too much darkness could kill, but too much light could blind.
data.author: Cassandra Clare

data.quote: Attitude is a choice. Happiness is a choice. Optimism is a choice. Kindness is a choice. Giving is a choice. Respect is a choice. Whatever choice you make makes you. Choose wisely.
data.author: Roy T. Bennett

data.quote: Working hard is not a waste of time, but a state of mind. Keep pushing your limits until you reach the edge. Then be kind and rewind.
data.author: Ana Claudia Antunes

data.quote: Sadly, we canâ€™t live forever. But we can write something that will.
data.author: T.N. Suarez
